attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M4fNOl9BAUR765b88Bl_powerdescription
attribs.current: (LvL0)You cause the earth to burst from beneath your feet. Each creature within range, other than you, must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 kinetic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M4fNOl9BAUR765b88Bl_powerathigherlevels
attribs.current: This power’s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M4fP2JLjPEOvv8qpOF9_powerdescription
attribs.current: (LvL 0)You touch one willing creature. Once before the power ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after the saving throw. The power then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M4fPZ6asZPeP5qVf3dA_powerdescription
attribs.current: (LvL1)Make a melee force attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-M4fPzw3-SfnGmQRvkAb_atk_desc
attribs.current:
(LvL0)You unleash a burst of psychic energy at a target within range. If the target can hear you (though it need not understand you), it must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take 2d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

At Higher Levels: This power’s damage increases by 1d4 when you reach 5th level (2d4), 11th level (3d4), and 17th level (4d4)

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M4fPpzyGi4ZIeg9jsiI_powerdescription
attribs.current: (LvL0)You unleash a burst of psychic energy at a target within range. If the target can hear you (though it need not understand you), it must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take 2d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M4fPpzyGi4ZIeg9jsiI_powerathigherlevels
attribs.current: This power’s damage increases by 1d4 when you reach 5th level (2d4), 11th level (3d4), and 17th level (4d4)

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-M4fQujxGlwAVbT6TimU_description
attribs.current:
You develop your conversational skill to better deceive others. You gain the following benefits:

    Increase your Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
    You gain proficiency in the Deception skill. If you are already proficient in it, you instead gain expertise in it.
    When you take the Attack action, you can replace one attack with an attempt to deceive one humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you. Make a Charisma (Deception) check contested by the target’s Wisdom (Insight) check. If your check succeeds, your movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks from the target and your attack rolls against it have advantage; both benefits last until the end of your next turn or until you use this ability on a different target. If your check fails, the target can’t be deceived by you in this way for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-M4fRUIq-FlLpBFHGzrX_description
attribs.current: After an attack you can use a focus point to make two unarmed strikes as bonus action

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-M4fRbVu-hmmQX9MZafa_description
attribs.current: You can spend one focus point to take the dodge action as a bonus action

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-M4fSChFKtLebqAVADV5_description
attribs.current: You can spend one focus point to take the disengage/dash action as a bonus action

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-M4fSJ-uZFp56SIwIyAQ_description
attribs.current: As a reaction you can try to deflect or catch when hit by a ranged weapon. When you do so, the damage is reduced by 1d10+Dex+Monk Lvl. If damage reduced to zero you can expend one focus point to make ranged attack (20-60) with caught idem.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M5ntDaS0CvfGB1wk0Nl_powerdescription
attribs.current: (LvL 1)You unleash a blast of psychic energy at a target within range. If the target can hear you (though it need not understand you), it must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 3d6 psychic damage and must immediately use its reaction, if available, to move as far as its speed allows away from you. The creature doesn’t move into obviously dangerous ground, such as a fire or a pit. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn’t have to move away. A deafened creature automatically succeeds on the save.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-M5nph3EeK1Nng0prl3t_description
attribs.current:
Until the power ends, your movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Once before the power ends, you can give yourself advantage on one weapon attack roll on your turn. That attack deals an extra 1d8 force damage on a hit. Whether you hit or miss, your walking speed increases by 30 feet until the end

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-M6Ws6tHHOEBvHBzTI6q_description
attribs.current: you can use your reaction when you fall to reduce any falling damage you take by an amount equal to five times your monk level.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-M6WsBgUYHD-SdgvuKh0_description
attribs.current: When you hit another creature with a melee weapon attack, you can spend 1 focus point to attempt a stunning strike. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-M6WsLP4lgaG6BGGXGXr_description
attribs.current: your instinctive agility lets you dodge out of the way of certain area effects. When you are subjected to an effect, such as a consular’s force storm or an engineer’s explosion, that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on a saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M6Wtd3sswQhiGoGtIw4_powerdescription
attribs.current: (LvL 1)For the duration, you sense the use of the Force, or its presence in an inanimate object within 30 feet of you. If you sense the Force in this way, you can use your action to determine the direction from which it originates and, if it’s in line of sight, you see a faint aura around the person or object from which the Force emanates.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M6WtvtpRydMBSg-MnKs_powerdescription
attribs.current: (LvL1)A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your forcecasting ability modifier. This power has no effect on droids or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M6WtvtpRydMBSg-MnKs_powerathigherlevels
attribs.current: Force Potency. When you cast this power using a force slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M6WuCnHvfKPe0HL4ZS-_powerdescription
attribs.current:
(LvL 2)You draw the willpower from a creature you can see within range. Make a ranged force attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 necrotic damage and it deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength until the power ends.

At the end of each of the target’s turns, it can make a Constitution saving throw against the power. On a success, the power ends.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M6WuCnHvfKPe0HL4ZS-_powerathigherlevels
attribs.current: Force Potency. When you cast this power using a force slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_power-cantrip_-M6Wucm0UZ3ZrDbDcfn0_powerdescription
attribs.current: (LvL2)You become invisible until the power ends. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on your person. The power ends if you attack or cast a power.
